title: Lumin-press-room
text: Join Lumin at the Sunnova Summit, booth 405, to learn how our smart solutions deliver intelligent energy management and optimize solar + storage performance.
text_mobile: Join Lumin at the Sunnova Summit,

blocks.press_room_posts_subtitle: We love when our skills and capacities are recognized by top international ratings. The most important validation, however, is the one we receive from our clients.

arhive_press_room.excerpt: Itron is collaborating with Lumin to enable edge intelligence in the companies' smart electrical panels.

press_room_top.text|raw: Only smart-circuit products like Lumin allow for easy load management to actually provide backup power to every corner of a home,” says Kelly Pickerel, Solar Power World Editor in Chief. “We chose Lumin as a Top Solar Product of 2020 because it is currently transforming the energy storage and backup power experience for homeowners, allowing batteries to perform as advertised.

blocks.press_room_media_kit_subtitle: We love when our skills and capacities are recognized by top international ratings. The most important validation, however, is the one we receive from our clients.

press_room_media_kit_rep.text_list: Here you’ll find brand-related icons and images. Please don't modify or misuse our logo. If you are unsure how to include our branded images into your content, contact us.

blocks.press_room_pr_subtitle: Let us know and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
